name: Stack Balls Out: Maze Rotate
description:
Rotate the labyrinth to move the Stack balls into another labyrinth on the Maze.
The more you stay calm, the higher the number of balls obtained and placed out the Maze!

Game Features:
-Twist Balls.
- Single finger control
- Different difficulty levels
- Smart gameplay
- Can become addictive.
-High 3D Graphics
-Smooth Play
-Amazing Color Worlds.


Good Play !
